welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Xiaodian, a charming city known for its rich cultural heritage and breathtaking natural beauty. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a Chinese phone number for access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nanyuan Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Nanyuan Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
